short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension automatically removes downloaded files that are older than 24 hours.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
WARNING: Downloads older than 24 hours are removed automatically WITHOUT ASKING user!

If you want to keep the downloaded file, please move or rename it.
